content.name: Terran Plot Scene 1
content.description: L2 Terran Plot Scene 1, The Sol Incident

param.name: LinkMission
param.description: Does this follow the Terran link mission

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: Added patrol mission after Oort Cloud

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue

param.name: Object
param.comment: The object to be scanned

cue.name: L2M001 Enter Oort
cue.comment: To check if the player has ever entered the Oort Cloud

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where values will be localized

param.name: Step
param.comment: The initial objective step

param.name: FinalSector
param.comment: The Address of the destination. Overrides all other criteria.

param.name: PatrolSector
param.comment: The next sector on the way to the destination

param.name: Preview
param.comment: Is the briefing a preview

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objectives and run the Objective library

param.name: IsPlot
param.comment: Is this a plot mission

param.name: OfferRace
param.comment: Name of the offer race

param.name: EnemyRace
param.comment: Race id or mask

param.name: Clear Enemies
param.comment: Only move on when there are no enemies around the player

param.name: Complete Briefing
param.comment: Run the briefing completion library

param.name: UseTimer
param.comment: Override the plot signal and use a timer

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored

param.name: PatrolDest
param.comment: Patrol the destination sector

param.name: PatrolTime
param.comment: Duration of patrol per sector in seconds

param.name: RewardCr
param.comment: Reward - credits

param.name: OBS
param.comment: Activate the OBS

param.name: Max OBS Instances
param.comment: The maximum OBS spawns. 0=Infinate

param.name: MaxOBSPerSector
param.comment: Max OBS spawns per sector

param.name: OBS Counter
param.comment: The name of the OBS counter

param.name: OBS Cue
param.comment: The cue name where the ship groups are saved too

param.name: OBSFleetRace
param.comment: The maker race ID of the ships or the racemask 'default' or 'pirategroup'

param.name: OBSFleetPilotsRace
param.comment: The race ID of the pilots

param.name: OBSMissionRank
param.comment: A 0-30 scale preferably based on the players fight rank

param.name: OBSDifficultyRank
param.comment: A 1-8 scale of difficulty

param.name: OBS Dock Support
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if the created support ships are docked with their homebase

param.name: OBS Support Overflow
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if additional support ships are created outside when the homebase is full

cue.name: L2M001 Plinter Move to Patrol Sector
L2M001 Set Objective Dock at SRS
